headline: Kimberly-Clark Reshapes Portfolio With Kenvue Deal And Higher Dividend
summary: Kimberly-Clark (NasdaqGS:KMB) announced plans to acquire Kenvue as part of a broad reshaping of its business portfolio. The company is targeting higher growth, higher margin personal care and health categories through this transaction. Shareholders are set to vote on the Kenvue deal, with management indicating expectations of strong approval. Kimberly-Clark also approved a dividend increase, extending its track record to 54 consecutive years of higher payouts. Kimberly-Clark, best known for...

headline: Kenvue Stock: Analyst Estimates & Ratings
summary: As Kenvue has underperformed the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a cautious outlook about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Kimberly-Clark Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Kimberly-Clark (NASDAQ:KMB) used its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 business update to emphasize progress under its “Powering Care” transformation plan, outline portfolio changes aimed at concentrating the company in higher-growth personal care categories, and provide an outlook for 2026. Leaders

headline: Kenvue Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: SUMMIT, N.J., January 28, 2026--Kenvue Inc. (NYSE: KVUE) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.2075 per share on its common stock. The quarterly dividend is payable on February 25, 2026, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on February 11, 2026.
